Trapezoid $ ABCD$ has bases $ \overline{AB}$ and $ \overline{CD}$ and diagonals intersecting at $ K$. Suppose that $ AB=9$, $ DC=12$, and the area of $ \triangle AKD$ is $ 24$. What is the area of trapezoid $ ABCD$?\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ 92 \qquad
\textbf{(B)}\ 94 \qquad
\textbf{(C)}\ 96 \qquad
\textbf{(D)}\ 98 \qquad
\textbf{(E)}\ 100$
